5_16JexJdvqRHRobrHnkbSWmdC8pfkkQzmiU.body: This is the real question. Quickly looking through the files, it looks like it's all hashed, IP address and everything, but your user auth (the name you go by - in my case lexusnova@zeroid.bit) isn't hashed nor is your data content. Though since the mail system IS encrypted it's likely a site-to-site choice of whether everything's plain text or encrypted.
